body.name: OGX Renewing +Cold-Pressed Argan Oil of Morocco Hydrating Hair Shampoo, Help Moisturize, Soften & Strengthen Hair, Paraben-Free with Sulfate-Free Surfactants, 13 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 18 mins
features: Indulge, fortify and strengthen: this 13-fluid Ounce bottle of OGX anti-breakage + Keratin oil fortifying Shampoo leaves hair feeling nourished and fortified from within while smoothing and reducing frizz

Prevent breakage and split ends: The anti-frizz shampoo helps hair resist breakage caused by brushing and styling as it strengthens split ends. It also helps increase elasticity so you can maintain longer, stronger locks with a luminescent shine

Hair Care inspired by nature: the nourishing damage-repair blend is fortified with Keratin proteins, which help fortify strands and are known to prevent breakage as well as argan oil, which is known for its conditioning and smoothing properties

Irresistibly delicious scent: The tropical orange, Island pineapple and golden amber scent Leaves locks with an irresistibly good smell with every wash. Plus the sulfate-free surfactant hair care system is paraben-free and gentle On your tresses
Beauty, pure and simple: for best results and to help smooth strands, use with anti-breakage + Keratin oil Conditioner and other products in our fortifying keratin oil Hair care collection.
body.description: Hydrate, repair, and renew dry hair with OGX Renewing + Argan Oil of Morocco Hydrating Hair Shampoo. Formulated with a powerful and precious blend containing cold-pressed Moroccan argan oil, the moisturizing shampoo helps improve hair strength and elasticity, leaving you with touchable tresses that are soft but strong. This smoothing shampoo also helps repair dry, damaged strands, locking in hydration as it cleans hair to give it a look and feel of silky perfection. Plus, the citrus-fresh, floral-green and woody scent makes lathering up an all-around sensory experience that leaves locks with an irresistibly good smell. Paraben-free with sulfate-free surfactants, this nourishing shampoo is gentle enough to give locks a natural boost and radiant shine while protecting them from styling. For a full hair care routine that'll leave your hair lush, soft and divinely shiny, pair with OGX Extra Strength Argan Oil of Morocco Conditioner.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: We approach beauty in our own way, pure and simple. Originality inspires us, that’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability — we approach beauty in our own way. OGX Renewing Plus Argan Oil of Morocco Shampoo Lather up with this precious OGX blend containing argan oil of Morocco, to help restore and strengthen your locks to silky perfection. It will help protect your hair from styling, without any sulfates or parabens. Supports shine and softness while strengthening Helps repair damaged strands Helps to hydrate and moisturize

Benefits Our OGX signature line is infused with the Argan Oil from the depths of the Argan tree from Morocco. Rich in natural vitamin E and super-charged antioxidants, this special ingredient has been making hair gorgeous for centuries. Ingredients A unique, precious blend with Argan Oil of Morocco helps to penetrate the hair shaft. Discover newly restored strength, shine, softness and seductive silky perfection. Hair Types This product is good for everyday use. Works well with all hair types: - Dry/Damaged. - Curly. - Thick. - Straight. Regimen For best results, use our entire Argan Oil of Morocco collection to help with every day moisture. After shampooing, we recommend our conditioner followed up with one of the treatments to help moisturize and restore shine to all hair types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful product, read my experience for info about my hair type etc. Try it out for yourself.
reviews.reviewText: Its great I still love this formula but I do honestly prefer the other formula which is the extra strength version. I find my hair and skin take to it better and doesn't at all trigger any acne in fact since I have so many skin allergies to face wash products and soap products from other companies I have resorted to washing my face with the extra strength version and my face has been taking well to the extra strength version, with no acne, no rashes and no enlarging of pores from it. Whether its correct or not I finally found something that I can also wash my face with that won't cause me any emergence of skin rashes nor does it seem to cause any acne and I have been using it for months. This version that is not extra strength I also use at times on my face too and I do find that occassionally it might cause a pimple or two and very occasionally some slight redness that usually clears up quickly. Now for the part that most people are interested in I have brunette and fine not thin/ thinning hair and both regular and extra strength versions even without the conditioner leave your hair extra silky smooth more manageable for my hair texture and fine hair type and bring out my natural colors and tones that are sometimes opaqued by cheap or heavily moisturizing shampoos. Both shampoos do give your hair aome good balanced volume but for all that I stated the shine the extra tones and more clearer lights/ highlights on my hair volume, and maintaining the health and luster I still recommend the extra strength version. Both are good but the extra strengrh version in my case just goes the extra mile and takes the cake in my opinion and experience. I still give this product 5/ 5 stars. I still reccomend to add the extra strength argan oil conditioner it'll do even more wonders for you and leave an even more beautiful luster that brings out/ highlights your natural highlights. 😉
Would highly recommend for those who are struggling with hairfall.Posting this review after 2 months of use. Hairfall has reduced and hair has become more voluminous.THIS IS A MUST BUY!!!
love these products hair feels great after and added body

reviews.reviewTitle: It's the real thing to take care of your hair.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this since 2021's November... I love this shampoo and conditioner both... It really changed my hair from damaged and dry into silky and soft... So I have been recommending to my circle and they ordered it this year... They are loving it too... But I did a mistake and bought smaller one this time but it's ok. Just one thing is that they increased it's price... 😞
